channel.title: CVE Feed for mediawiki -- mediawiki (SyntaxHighlight extension)

item.title: CVE-2017-0372|2024-08-05T13:03:57.018Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki%20%28syntaxhighlight%20extension%29
item.description: Parameters injection in the SyntaxHighlight extension of Mediawiki before 1.23.16, 1.27.3 and 1.28.2 might result in multiple vulnerabilities.
